body: Im in love with the art, but damn the man is almost always annoying
I like this...but goddamn it, knowing what's going down few chapters down the line really pisses me off. This would've been a good story and then they introduced that annoying character.

Although I see the stories still not pleasing me, but that does not take away the good art it has, makes it very extensive history and loses coherence. I don't like Tw1n Mi1f. Except for Kay0i Zumama ( Short and Epic )
